channel.description: Lance Zeeman and Shane "The Duke' Wellington update you on everything you need to know about the world of entertainment.

item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Marvel's Pink Milli Vanilli Viewmaster
item.itunes:title: Marvel's Pink Milli Vanilli Viewmaster
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Future with Teddy Pendergrass
item.description: The CAPTAIN MARVEL movie bridges the gap between AVENGERS INFINITY WAR and ENDGAME as the MARVEL journey nears a conclusion this week at the movies. The trailer for the hybrid documentary on the inventor of the car from BACK TO THE FUTURE has hit the the net. An English language movie of HELLO KITTY has been announced as well as a picture based on the 80's toy the VIEWMASTER. Get ready for a LOVE T.K.O as TEDDY PENDERGRASS gets the biopic treatment, and the MILLI VANILLI scandal is 30 years old. #BeHeard The Weekend Party Entertainment Report. A Solid Gold Studios Podcast.
item.itunes:summary: The CAPTAIN MARVEL movie bridges the gap between AVENGERS INFINITY WAR and ENDGAME as the MARVEL journey nears a conclusion this week at the movies. The trailer for the hybrid documentary on the inventor of the car from BACK TO THE FUTURE has hit the the net. An English language movie of HELLO KITTY has been announced as well as a picture based on the 80's toy the VIEWMASTER. Get ready for a LOVE T.K.O as TEDDY PENDERGRASS gets the biopic treatment, and the MILLI VANILLI scandal is 30 years old. #BeHeard The Weekend Party Entertainment Report. A Solid Gold Studios Podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: Captain Marvel,Teddy Pendergrass,Alec Baldwin,DeLorean,Hello Kitty,ViewMaster,Tyrese Gibson,Milli Vanilli,Brie Larson, Samuel Leroy Jackson,Iron Man,Avengers Endgame

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Lego Gizmos Grande in Vegas
item.itunes:title: Lego Gizmos Grande in Vegas
item.itunes:subtitle: Live and Let Kiss Kiss
item.description: LEGO THE SECOND PART is here, A MOGWAI named GIZMO is set to return, BOND 25 gets a working title, MMA and strippers go to a wine tasting, THE FORCE is mentioned how many times in the 9 STAR WARS MOVIES, ARIANA GRANDE sets the pace as she enters the record books while the music industry coins it as streaming becomes the new JUKEBOX. JANET JACKSON hits VEGAS as REGINA KING and SPIKE LEE get some love from OSCAR

item.author: weekendparty@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Weekend Party | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: What Taraji Wants for $40
item.itunes:title: What Taraji Wants for $40
item.itunes:subtitle: Paris Hilton Tinders for Cows on VHS
item.description: TARAJI P HENSON gets some insight into WHAT MEN WANT along with TRACY MORGAN and RICHARD ROUNDTREE in a gender swap of WHAT WOMEN WANT. 80's legends JOAN and JACKIE COLLINS' lives are going to be turned into a TV Series. VHS is trying to make a hipster comeback, PARIS HILTON is back in the studio, CHRIS CORNELL is to get the Documentary treatment courtesy of BRAD PITT, The 91st Academy Awards take place this weekend and farm animals are getting their own version of TINDER.
item.itunes:summary: TARAJI P HENSON gets some insight into WHAT MEN WANT along with TRACY MORGAN and RICHARD ROUNDTREE in a gender swap of WHAT WOMEN WANT. 80's legends JOAN and JACKIE COLLINS' lives are going to be turned into a TV Series. VHS is trying to make a hipster comeback, PARIS HILTON is back in the studio, CHRIS CORNELL is to get the Documentary treatment courtesy of BRAD PITT, The 91st Academy Awards take place this weekend and farm animals are getting their own version of TINDER.
item.itunes:keywords: Taraji P Henson, What Men Want, Joan Collins, Jackie Collins VHS, Urban Outfitters, Paris Hilton, Chris Cornell, Tudder, Dame, Hollywood Wives, Brad Pitt, IT Girl, Tracy Morgan, 38, 91st Academy Awards, Peter Berg, Soundgarden, Dynasty, app, Richard Roundtree, $40, 40 Dollars

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Alita Hustles Bad Boy Blue
item.itunes:title: Alita Hustles Bad Boy Blue
item.itunes:subtitle: Grande Battles Vinyl
item.description:
ALITA: BATTLE ANGEL is here along with some massive movie trailers, including YESTERDAY, a cinema take on the BEATLES that I cannot wait to see, FROZEN 2, HUSTLE and a blue WILL SMITH finally pops up in ALADDIN. EDDIE MURPHY is finally COMING TO AMERICA again along with a possible FATAL ATTRACTION remake. ARIANA GRANDE is the streaming Queen, PEARL JAM links up with WORLD RECORD DAY and finally The UNITED NATIONS asks you to turn it down.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

item.title: An Old Man Boomerangs R Kelly
item.itunes:title: An Old Man Boomerangs R Kelly
item.itunes:subtitle: Halle Berry streams Looney Tunes

item.title: Bautista a Drone and some Slippers!
item.itunes:title: Bautista a Drone and some Slippers!
item.itunes:subtitle: Brosnon listens to Aretha
item.description:
DAVID BAUTISTA teams up with PIERCE BROSNON for the action picture FINAL SCORE. Horror comedy THE DRONE is getting a VOD release. Listening to your favorite album in a movie theater could be a thing and an ARETHA FRANKLIN tribute is coming to the tube with TYLER PERRY hosting. Finally THE HOUSE OF DREW AKA JUSTIN BIEBER has launched a low cost line of hotel slippers that sold out ASAP.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

item.title: Fight Night on Broadway
item.itunes:title: Fight Night on Broadway
item.itunes:subtitle: The Boss and The Boxing
item.description:
Creed II punches above the belt on the big screen, the teaser trailer for the 'live action' remake of The Lion King racks up over 224 million hits in 24 hours, Bruce Springsteen on Broadway is coming to Netflix in December, Katy Perry is the highest earning female in music this year as Kenny G plays the stock market and its Wilder vs Fury for the WBC Championship Belt.

item.title: Toxic Submarine in a Jam
item.itunes:subtitle: No Black Friday info here...
item.description:
The submarine movie Hunter Killer hits the movie screen, Snoop Dogg gets his Star on the Walk of Fame, Space Jam 2 is happening, A David Bowie virtual museum will be a downloadable app. Kanye West and Mark Zuckerberg do Karaoke and Toxic is Oxford's word of the year.

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Amazing Grace and The Book of Face | 17 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
The crime caper Widows is at the movies, Aretha Frankin's gospel concert finally gets a release some 40 years after it was filmed. Cheech and Chong are pushing hemp based grooming products, Facebook are trying to lure back the teens as Spielberg, Winfrey and Jones reunite for another shot at The Color Purple. Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Spiders, Sequels, Spice Girls and Little Mix | 10 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode : Computer Hacker Lisbeth Salander is back as Hollywood gets an overdose of sequelitis. Next up is Austin Powers, Gladiator and Shrek. The Spice Girls are back minus Posh, but Little Mix is where Girl Power is at as Duran Duran become socially aware courtesy of David Medina.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

item.title: Do the Neymar as Tyson grows Weed in the Jungle with 50 and Prince! | 3 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. PRINCE gets the doccie treatment and 50 Cent resumes his beef with JA RULE as STOP, DROP and ROLL becomes a thing courtesy of NEYMAR.

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: First Man in Black Samples a Cat on Halloween | 27 October 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode :Its a Giant Leap for biopics as Niel Armstrong's journey from a test pilot to astronaut gets the movie treatment in FIRST MAN. The filming on the MIB spin off with Chris Hemsworth has wrapped, will we get to see a Big Willie cameo? Conceptual artist Sophie Calle's cat died so she recorded a 37 track album in dedicated to her late feline friend. Nicki Minaj is being sued for sampling Tracey Chapman with out getting permission, the irony is that the song is called SORRY. It's a very Happy Halloween as Freddy Krueger, Jason Voorhees, Ghostface, Michael Myers and Leatherface spoof the Backstreet Boys with 'I'LL KILL YOU THAT WAY'

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
